subject: Your check is still waiting
body:
Hello Subscriber,

We apologize for contacting you at this time of the day, and we hope that we haven't interrupted you in anyway, but we wanted to make sure that you received the message that we sent you last week.

We have checks ready to send you for offering us your honest opinion on various online surveys that only take a few minutes to complete. So if you're interested in earning a nice extra income each month for just giving your opinion on various surveys then press here to begin:

http://leftgarden.com/t/q4tde.2lp/574597

PSC and its partners bring you fresh opportunities to express your opinions, participate in online focus groups, try out new products, be heard AND be paid to boot! How would you like to sit in the comfort of your own home, fill out surveys online, and participate in online focus groups and get a nice big paycheck at the end of the month?

You can participate whenever you'd like, morning, noon, night .. midnight if you'd like .. it doesn't matter. Simply log in and select surveys to fill out, get paid for your time. Work for 30 minutes or three hours, it doesn't matter ..you set your own hours!

Press here to start:

http://leftgarden.com/t/q4tde.2lp/574597

We can only accept a few more people, but we will accept you if you're interested...and we hope you are!

Thank you,

Jessica Petersen
PSC Representative since 1998
-----

To Unsubscribe from future SurveyClub emails use this link:

http://leftgarden.com/t/q4tde.2lp/574598

addresshereDuring the removal period, you may receive some invitations that were already in process when your request was received. To Unsubscribe via U.S. Mail please send all inquiries to: 
SurveyClub, 
#425 3210 E Chinden Blvd #115, 
Eagle, 
ID 83616.

Hi Subscriber! You are receiving this solicitation because producttestpanel@speedy.uwaterloo.ca previously agreed to receive correspondence from ELongView. If this service should fail to meet your expectations, feel free to disassociate yourself from our service.
http://leftgarden.com/u/13dc/producttestpanel%40speedy.uwaterloo.ca/2

Should you want to contact us via the United States Postal Service, our address is as follows:
370 W. Pleasantview Ave Suite 206 Hackensack, NJ 7061
